title: Cisco | G8 | BLR | 40+ LPA | Need Suggestion
content:
Education: B. Tech from tier III
Years of Experience: 3 year 10 months
Prior Experience: 2 years at Service based MNC(3.6 LPA) + ~2 years at PBC
Current Salary : 22 fixed + 4.2 Bonus + 5.3 RSU (vested equally over 3 years)
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: Cisco
Title/Level: Software Engineer, G08
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 34L INR
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 6L in first month salary 
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus 8% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + JB): ~42L for first year
Benefits: Standard Cisco Benefits

Intial offer was 3L joining bonus in first month, after negotiation 3L bonus got added after completion of 12 months, negotiated again, then HR increased first month bonus to 6L.

Need sugestions regarding stocks. Cisco generally offers stocks at G8 level but I didnt get any, shall I negotiate further for it?
Also, what is the standard amount of stocks Cisco provides for this level? It would be helpful if anyone can suggest 

I'll add interview experience soon.

title: (Need Help on Negotiation) Tracxn | Software Engineer | 2 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Engineering in Tier-3
Years of Experience: 2 
Prior Experience: Associate Software Engineer at Fintech Startup Company
Prior Salary : 8.6 LPA (6 Fixed + 2 Bonus semi annually )
Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: Tracxn
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 10 L 
Relocation: 5k travel + 20k accomodation + 10k goods accomodation
Total comp (Salary + relocation): INR 10,35,000
Benefits: 4L insurance + 1k internet 

Please help me how much should I negotiate on this offer?
**Note - I don't have another offer.**

title: Amazon | SDE-2 | Hyderabad | Oracle (OCI) | IC-3 (SMTS) | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B.Tech (Old IIT)
Years of Experience: 5 Years 3 Months
Prior Experience: Paytm
Current Compensation: 31 CTC


Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE-2 / L5
Location: Hyderabad (Work from office)
Salary: 46lpa fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.5 lpa
Stock bonus: Around 35lpa (5 + 15 + 40 + 40)
Signing Bonus : 14lpa (1st Year) + 12lpa(2nd Year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 64lpa (including fixed, sign on and RSUs)
Benefits: Standard Amazon Benefits


Company: Oracle OCI
Title/Level: SMTS / IC-3
Location: Bengaluru (Will be Work from Home as of now)
Salary: 40lpa fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.5 lpa + 3.5lpa retention bonus on completion of 18 months
Stock bonus: Around 70lpa (25% / year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 60lpa (including fixed, sign on and RSUs)
Benefits: Standard Oracle Benefits


Currently a bit consfused as Struggling to decide as in oracle it is work from office but work from office is not very good thing for professional growth it do have its benefits where as Amazon has a very Hustled culture and Job security issues, work life balance also not good, So getting confused which one to go with.

title: GOOGLE L3 COMPENSATION- BANGALORE
content:
Years of Experience: 1 year 2 months
Prior Experience: SDE at product based company( ecom platform)
Previous CTC: 32 lpa(18 base + 3 lakhs joining bonus+3 lakhs retention bonus+ rest all were esops)
Date of the Offer: NOV 2024
Company: Google
Title: L3
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: ₹21,90,000
Perf. Bonus: ₹3,28,000 
Relocation Bonus: NIL
Signing Bonus: NIL
Stock bonus: $ 58,000 vesting over 4 years ( 1st year stock component around - 18.3 lakhs)
Benefits: Standard Google Benefits
Other details: No other competing offers

Am i getting lowballed? Tried negotiating with the recruiter but she said this is the max they can offer
